document.full_text: ayman al-zawahri, long the second in command of al qaeda, delivered his first public comments wednesday on the killing of his boss, osama bin laden.
document.title: asia: qaeda no. 2 delivers video eulogy to bin laden
lines_and_colors: ayman al-zawahri, long the second in command of al qaeda, delivered his first public comments wednesday on the killing of his boss, osama bin laden.
